wikipedia_page.main: Ruth Ann Watson Gregory is a British mathematician and physicist, currently Head of Department of Physics and Professor of Theoretical Physics at King's College London. Her fields of specialisation are general relativity and cosmology.

response: * Ruth Gregory – Professor of Mathematics and Physics at Durham University

link_mentions.page: Royal Society Wolfson Research Merit Award

response: * Ruth Gregory, British mathematical physicist specializing in general relativity and cosmology

The Gregory–Laflamme instability (after Ruth Gregory and Raymond Laflamme) is a result in theoretical physics which states that certain black strings and branes are unstable in dimensions higher than four.
